abstract: Italy's highest court will issue final ruling on case of American college student Amanda Knox and her Italian boyfriend Raffaele Sollecito, who were accused of murdering British exchange student Meredith Kercher; ruling could start extradition process for Knox, who returned to Washington State in 2011 upon her acquittal.
lead_paragraph: More than seven years after Ms. Knox, an American, and her Italian boyfriend were accused of murdering a British exchange student, Italy’s highest court is set to issue a final ruling.

headline.main: Italy’s Highest Court Set to Rule in Amanda Knox Case
headline.print_headline: Italy’s Highest Court Set to Rule in American’s Case

snippet: More than seven years after Ms. Knox, an American, and her Italian boyfriend were accused of murdering a British exchange student, Italy’s highest court is set to issue a final ruling.
